title: "Gate-tunable van der Waals heterostructure for reconfigurable neural network vision sensor"
excerpt: "Early processing of visual information takes place in the human retina. Mimicking neurobiological structures and functionalities of the retina provides a promising pathway to achieving vision sensor with highly efficient image processing."
